A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I've seen it 3 times now with Empire Strikes Back thrown in there for good measure. simply put the movie was great! If you're a casual moviegoer or someone not tied into your own whitewashed memories of the pasts. If you use to dress up like Luke Skywalker\, read all the old expanded universe novels\, and like to have answers spoon fed to you\, you'll hate it\, ut not aas much as when your mom yell down in the basement that she has dinner ready in the middle of your marathon session of playing WOW and commenting on Reddit\, while you eat Cinnamon Toast Crunch.
